(inner) fromWei(number, unit) → {String|Object}

Takes a number of wei and converts it to any other ether unit. Possible units are: SI Short SI Full Effigy Other - kwei femtoether babbage - mwei picoether lovelace - gwei nanoether shannon nano - -- microether szabo micro - -- milliether finney milli - ether -- -- - kether -- grand - mether - gether - tether
Parameters:
Name Type Description
number Number | String can be a number, number string or a HEX of a decimal
unit String the unit to convert to, default ether
Source:
  • dist/web3.js, line 1736
Returns:
When given a BigNumber object it returns one as well, otherwise a number
Type
String | Object

Takes a number of wei and converts it to any other ether unit. Possible units are: SI Short SI Full Effigy Other - kwei femtoether babbage - mwei picoether lovelace - gwei nanoether shannon nano - -- microether szabo micro - -- milliether finney milli - ether -- -- - kether -- grand - mether - gether - tether
Parameters:
Name Type Description
number Number | String can be a number, number string or a HEX of a decimal
unit String the unit to convert to, default ether

Possible units are: SI Short SI Full Effigy Other - kwei femtoether babbage - mwei picoether lovelace - gwei nanoether shannon nano - -- microether szabo micro - -- microether szabo micro - -- milliether finney milli - ether -- -- - kether -- grand - mether - gether - tether

Name Type Description

unit String the unit to convert from, default ether

Takes a number of wei and converts it to any other ether unit. Possible units are: SI Short SI Full Effigy Other - kwei femtoether babbage - mwei picoether lovelace - gwei nanoether shannon nano - -- microether szabo micro - -- milliether finney milli - ether -- -- - kether -- grand - mether - gether - tether
Parameters:
Name Type Description
number Number | String can be a number, number string or a HEX of a decimal
unit String the unit to convert to, default ether
Source:
  • lib/utils/utils.js, line 294
Returns:
When given a BigNumber object it returns one as well, otherwise a number
Type
String | Object

(inner) toWei(number, unit) → {String|Object}

Takes a number of a unit and converts it to wei. Possible units are: SI Short SI Full Effigy Other - kwei femtoether babbage - mwei picoether lovelace - gwei nanoether shannon nano - -- microether szabo micro - -- microether szabo micro - -- milliether finney milli - ether -- -- - kether -- grand - mether - gether - tether
Parameters:
Name Type Description
number Number | String | BigNumber can be a number, number string or a HEX of a decimal
